Cutoff Instructions: Cut off when an individual is no longer serving as a Capstone official.
Transfer Instructions: Transfer to the National Archives 15 years after cut off.  Delete all other versions, such as those existing in live systems and agency archives.
Legacy Email Scope: In the majority of cases, no legacy email exists because print-and-file policy was previously utilized; where available, legacy email for certain Commissioners will be included (dating back to early 2016).

Name of Agency to Which this Form Applie: Court Services and Offender Supervision Agency
Additional Scope Comments: The Pretrial Services Agency (PSA) is related to CSOSA by virtue of its service relationship the Superior Court for the District of Columbia and the United States District Court for the District of Columbia. The Pretrial Services Agency is a federal independent entity within CSOSA.  Record group number 562 covers both CSOSA and PSA.  Cutoff of email will be by employee tenure.
Legacy Email Scope: Agency will be including legacy email for all items being used, dating back to approximately 2000.

Name of Agency to Which this Form Applie: Department of the Army  US Army Space & Missile Defense Command
Additional Scope Comments: Army Corps of Engineers, RG 77, Office of the Surgeon General RG 112, Army Staff RG 319,  Army Secretariat RG 335, Army Special Operations Command  RG 338, Army Surface Deployment & Distribution Command RG 338, US Army South RG 338, US Army North/5th Army RG 338, US Army Central RG 338,  US Army Africa RG 338, Army Materiel Command RG 544, US Army Europe RG 549, US Army Pacific RG 550, Army Training & Doctrine Command RG 553, Army Forces Command RG 555.Other emails will be managed using standard Records Management practices based on content of the email.  They will be placed into electronic folders in the Army Records Information Management System (ARIMS).  Army is also pursuing other automated records management solutions with DOD and other DOD Components for use in automated processing of all electronic records.
Legacy Email Scope: Agency will be including legacy email dating back to 2013, as the email journaling policy defined in the Army Regulation 25-400-2 Army Records Information Management System was in place prior to Capstone.
Whom should NARA contact if there any qu: Anthony D. Crawley-Gibson,  Chief, Army Records Management Division, Anthony.d.crawley-gibson.civ@mail.mil,  703-428-6464
